column1: Amazing Luxury, the moment you reach Mumbai

This is one of the best hotels in Mumbai.  Great service, looks grand both inside and outside, and with some of the best India restaurants in Mumbai in house.  And did I mention, it's a 3-min ride from the International airport?  I've been staying here for over 10 yrs, and always look forward to the next visit.  It always feels like I am staying in a royal palace!
